title: Rumble x Tristana is being confirmed!
body:
[](http://img00.deviantart.net/2bc5/i/2016/044/4/f/__league_of_legends___valentin_day_by_n_lilix-d9rmvrf.png)
http://imgur.com/a/dAAxV
YAY!

http://67.media.tumblr.com/677fb0f717740f1301036f0d3c4204dd/tumblr_o1hhiz065k1sfwp7ko1_500.png

(I know this seems like a troll post, but I made this post a while back in M&G, and they suggested I put it here... so here it is! Happy now mods?)

replies.body: You 8balled that like 17 times and the first 16 all said no.
no, those said "Reply Hazy, Try Again."
{{champion:18}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:115}} BOMB SQUAD ot3
How about just {{champion:68}} {{champion:18}}.... seems better IMO. lol

that is.......

unfortunate
{{champion:68}} would never share {{champion:18}}. Just telling it how it is...

it not so much of rumble "sharing" tristana if its a true polyamorous relationship

in which rumble loves ziggs just as much as he loves tristana 

and tristana loves ziggs just as much as she loves rumble

and ziggs loves tristana just as much as he loves rumble

and if it wasn't then lore would suggest rumble is the one being """shared""

Well... I have never read Zigg's lore, so I have no clue how he is connected to Trist... give me a sec

*Goes to read Zigg's Lore*

Aight... so Trist is not mentioned anywhere in Zigg's lore, and is not mentioned as a friend of his, and Ziggs is not mentioned as a friend of hers... so I'm confused by how you came to the conclusion that Rumble is the one being shared between the two... unless by that you mean that they both love Rumble, but Rumble does not necessarily love both of them, since lore wise he has a crush on Trist and is only friends with Ziggs.

wht

trist is only friends with rumble.... he has a crush on her..... but she does not necessarily have a crush on him elipse so im confused how you came to the conclusion that tristana and rumble are in a relationship

What I'm saying is that if we are sticking to lore, your statement of "Rumble being the one who is shared." Would mean that he does not love both of them, but at least loves one of them, while both of them love him.

>your statement of "Rumble being the one who is shared." Would mean that he does not love both of them

no it wouldnt. and even if it did

ever hear of an open relationship
ziggs nd rumble could easily have a fwb situation while trist n rumble r truly the "thing"
Except a Friend with Benefits relationship would never be a thing lore wise with Rumble and Ziggs, because as stated in his lore, he's straight and seems to only have his eyes on Trist.

wheres it say he straight

point me specifically to where it says he aint bi, i want the receipts

I want you to point me to where it says he is bi/gay, becuase as of the moment it is implied that he is straight. Seriously, people always love to use the "Show me where this is... I know you can't" arguement, when the same statement can be used against them.

LOL
the same statement can be used against me? no, it really can't. i actually used your own words against you earlier in the discusion when i used all those elipses, that's what using someones own logic against them really looks like

all throughout this discussion i have been strictly postulating because there is no evidence for either claim. you specificially stated that rumbles lore defines him as straight, but it doesn't. i never made the claims that lore states rumble as bi in a polyamorous relationship with tristana and ziggs.

i merely stated "lore wise" that they would be "sharing" rumble because they are both friends with him. to which you replied, "lore wise" rumble is straight (which was incorrect). but you know what? "lore wise" tristana doesn't see rumble as anything more than a friend, the same way "lore wise" rumble doesn't see ziggs as anything more than a friend.

stating one or the other with certainty is stupid
ya im not going to be speaking literal in a noncanon shipping thread about anthropomorphic hamsters

i accidentally replied 2 myself oops

edit: wait what

it seems weh ave reached MAXIMUM THREAD

Okay, I see what you're saying... I was pointing out everything from a lore perspective, and when you started stated lore wise in one of your original posts I thought that you had decided that we were arguing lore wise. Sorry, that I misinterpreted your actions.
ploop

Welp... neither has actually been confirmed... which makes me sad... anyways

Teemo does not equal evil, read the lore

A better use of adjective to describe Tristana, would be hyperactive, spunky, out going... etc.
{{champion:18}}x{{champion:78}} Now thats the true ship.  http://i.imgur.com/MzBZOrw.gif

I don't Rumble to get the girl.

It goes against the status quo and how things are in real life.

He's the underdog, somewhat quirky, means well and acts awkwardly around the girl he likes to the point where it's obvious, but he probably doesn't say things outright, so she lets it be.  Let the asshole who is like "Sup. Like my shrooms," come in and take her away.

#FriendZone {{item:3070}}

> I don't Rumble to get the girl.

Wut?

> He's the underdog, somewhat quirky, means well and acts awkwardly around the girl he likes to the point where it's obvious, but he probably 
doesn't say things outright, so she lets it be. Let the asshole who is like "Sup. Like my shrooms," come in and take her away.

underdog? Not entirely... He is not someone that loses a lot of the time, but is simply beat up for stating his opinions... *cough* and that Heimerdinger is the worst yordle and that is actual fact *cough*... We have yet to actually see an interaction between Rumble and Trist, or Teemo and Trist in something that's not fan made, so stating what he is based on pure fan fiction shows that you don't know what you are talking about. Plus, Teemo is actually quite nice, not an ass hole. Learn your lore dude.
